metadata.title: CVE-2015-1564 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in style-underground/search inPlain Black WebGUI 7.10.29 and earlier allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the Search field.

criterions.comment: webgui package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
